name: CubeHuggers
description:
Once again i visited this game idea generator and it gave me this: 

While I couldn't achieve the "student project" part, i decided to keep the idea.

Over on my discord server (which you can join here) i held a poll, and this was voted. 

Here we go again. 

In this endless arcade-esque game you have a time limit in which you must hug the cubes which are conveniently provided to you! When you hug a cube, the timer resets and you get a point! If you can't hug a cube in time, you will stop breathing and die!

Controls: 

 W A S D to move, SPACE to jump, SHIFT to sprint, CLICK to hug, ESC to go to menu
